resources.string: Basketball is the only major sport completely American in origin.
Magma is the scientific name for lava.
Skin is the human body\'s largest organ.
The classic sci-fi novel Fahrenheit 451 gets its title from the temperature used to burn paper.
Ostriches bury their heads up to 18 inches in the sand.
Louis Braille, creator of the Braille system of writing for the blind, was himself blind.
Other than water, coffee is the world\'s most popular drink.
An American was the first man in space.
The Forbidden City is in Beijing.
Hurricanes and typhoons are the same thing.
